Bart Scott spoke for many when he talked about Ben Roethlisberger during conference championship week. "The respect we have for Ben Roethlisberger is that we don't look at him as a diva quarterback," said Bart Scott . We look at him as a football player. In this league, especially now, quarterbacks are treated pretty much like it's flag football. But he's one that's willing to take the hits and look down the barrel of a gun for his team. Tom Brady , Peyton Manning , Drew Brees , Michael Vick and Philip Rivers are all done for the season. Big Ben Roethlisberger is back in the Super Bowl. He's nothing like Aaron Rodgers . But he usually wins.

Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Previous article Grand jury

been fast enough," Barack Obama said. At today's meeting with CEOs, Barack Obama and Hu said it was important for the two nations to deepen their business ties. "It all feels very, very good that you asked us to be a partner, Jim McNerney, the chief executive officer of Boeing, said to Hu at the start of the session.
